definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: Phone calls and texts are great for private, personal chats.
sentences.chinese: 电话，短信对于私密，个人间的聊天非常不错。

sentences.english: Private space is enclosed by flexible sliding bamboo doors.
sentences.chinese: 私密空间采用了可以滑动的竹门。

sentences.english: Jean: But not only the body’s contour but also some private parts are revealed.
sentences.chinese: 可是不仅仅是身体的轮廓，而且私密部分都被暴露了。

sentences.english: Respect your spouse's right to privacy; individual space is important.
sentences.chinese: 尊重爱侣的私密，亲暱的关系更需要空间。

sentences.english: But humans have disturbed this privacy.
sentences.chinese: 但是人类打扰了它们的私密性。

sentences.english: 1Password secures your most private data without inconveniencing you.
sentences.chinese: 一码通帮帮你轻松保护最私密的资料。

sentences.english: The private balcony is designed to provide guests with a spectacular view of the starry night sky.
sentences.chinese: 私密的观景阳台设计为客人晚上观星提供便利条件。

sentences.english: Both of the husband and wife enjoy individual ownership of their respective possessions.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫和妻子都对各自的私密空间享有个人所有权。

sentences.english: The inside room was a very private place.
sentences.chinese: 这个“里屋”是一个非常私密的地方。

sentences.english: It's said you were taking a stroll, with your secret, walking slowly. ( I appreciate the tone of the version, which echoes the original one well)
sentences.chinese: 听说你在散步，带着你的私密慢慢走着。

sentences.english: It's a deeply personal story of marriage and secrets.
sentences.chinese: 这则故事关婚姻和秘密，内容极其私密。

sentences.english: Clovelly, Eastern suburbs This truly is a hidden Secret Garden.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个真正的隐蔽的私密花园。

sentences.english: Light up your heart, and let the warm soft light flows into your private world.
sentences.chinese: 点亮心中的灯，让温馨柔和的光，曳泻私密的小天地。

sentences.english: The lack of data privacy safeguards is also a sore point for some.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏数据私密性保护也是一些人的痛点。

sentences.english: It's said you were taking a stroll, with your secret, walking slowly.
sentences.chinese: 听说你在散步，带着你的私密慢慢走着。

definition: style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
to live alone/to spend time alone (or with a significant other)
to make known to the masses (idiom); to publicize widely/to let the world know
